name: Butter & Flies
description:
As a BUTTER try to avoid FLIES. Use A and D to rotate a pan. Your goal is to beat 3 levels, increasing in difficulty.

Game made for 48 + 8 Jam #2 with theme "Butterfly".

Background: Photo by Dmitry Zvolskiy from Pexels

Flies sound effect: https://www.freesoundslibrary.com/fly-noise/
